typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as string,
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as string,
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['TOU*.csv']) ~> TOUSource
TOUSource aggregate() ~> TOUAggregate
